name: rowcast
description: Intelligent Rowing Conditions Platform - Real-time weather analytics for rowers

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/__pycache__ backend/app/__pycache__

author: Sam Duncan <sam@samwduncan.com>
